Articles.Content:
I'm going about my normal KSP things building a crew shuttle when ...

![1epAv1E.png](http://i.imgur.com/1epAv1E.png)

That happens. My turbojet is shrunk.

I've known about this issue, just never had it happen ... until now. A quick game restart did not fix it, so the question being asked is *what will?*

Went through my modulemanager cache, gamedata, and a few other places to verify no mods were messing with it. Nothing messes with that part (and my physics is pretty much unchanged).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T23:17:21Z" title="08/11/2015 11:17  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by Captain Sierra**

You could see if this still works.

[**Slumpie's stock scaling bug fix.**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96339-0-25-StockScal%3Cbr%20/%3E+%20ingBugFix-V2-MM-Update-fixed-some-mishaps)

Thx. Giving that a shot now. If thats too out of date and doesnt work, what do you suggest as plan B? I went ahead and overwrote Gamedata\Squad\Engine from my 1.0.4 zip (my stock backup) and that didnt fix the issue.

EDIT: no good. No additional adverse effects but its just too out of date to work.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T18:51:39Z" title="08/11/2015 06:51  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by Captain Sierra**

I've seen reports that this effect is related to RealPlume, see Felger's post [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4?p=2131076&viewfull=1#post2131076), and a possible fix [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4?p=2127281&viewfull=1#post2127281).

> 
> I've seen reports that this effect is related to RealPlume, see Felger's post [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4?p=2131076&viewfull=1#post2131076), and a possible fix [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4?p=2127281&viewfull=1#post2127281).

Well damn. Turns out I had RP installed incorrectly (so, with no effects, i didnt even realize I had it installed) and a quick removal later, my turbojet is back to normal.

I'd even gone to Ven's Stock Revamp because I thought overwriting the model would fix it. It didn't, but this did. Thx.

> 
> I've seen reports that this effect is related to RealPlume, see Felger's post [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4?p=2131076&viewfull=1#post2131076), and a possible fix [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4?p=2127281&viewfull=1#post2127281).

Wow, your ability to answer pretty much any question off the top of your head AND be able to produce reference links on demand is very amazing.
